Class DrawingPoint

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.DrawingObject
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.objects.DrawingPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Coordinated
public class DrawingPoint extends DrawingObject
Represents an x, y point in a CoordinateSystem.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
